Movie has Swedish and Thai parts but no subtitles. Not sure why none of these groups add hardcoded subtitles. It makes downloading rips a waste of time. Full DVDs and DVd Screeners always have the hardcoded subs.

Poor release from another lazy group.

@56453ryt: Meg Ryan isn't in this movie, what are you talking about?

@sylvianre: Hardcoded subtitles are an abomination that duplicates the work for release groups (having to encode multiple copies of every movie) and gives us heaps of torrents for every movie, which will make downloading slower since you will have less seeders/peers per torrent. So stop being so lazy yourself and just download a subtitle file in your preferred language (which will only be a few kilobytes), you whining retard.
